332a2(mdo 'grel): dbyings lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pas/ ji ltar gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la med pa la bslab par bgyi/ tha dang med pa la tha dad du bslabs na phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ram/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar lang
332a3(mdo 'grel): gzhan ma yin chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan ma lags so/ /de'i lan gzugs dang rnam mkhyen gyi bar yang gzhan ma yin pas byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i chos kyi dbyings las ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang ma mthong ste/ chos thams cad chos kyi
332a4(mdo 'grel): dbyings su shes nas ming med pa la ming gi brngas ston te/ 'di ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar ro zhes bya bar ston no/ /dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis rdzas kyi rnam bgyi na zhig la brten te gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs glang po nas sangs rgyas kyi sku'i yan lag
332a5(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i bar du bstan na/ de la sems can byis pa'i ngang tshul can dag de la ngo mtshar du 'dzin/ skyes bu mkhas shin gsol ba mgo skor du go/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang gang
332a6(mdo 'grel): ma mthong yang/ thabs la mkhas pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed kyang/ sems can mi dmigs par sbyin pa na rnam mkhyen gyi bar du bdag kyang spyod gzhan yang spyod 'jug chos kyi dbyings dus gsum du 'gyur ba med pa sems can rnams la ston to//
332a7(mdo 'grel): mnyam pa nyid kyi le'u ste re bzhi pa'o// //le'u 'di nas 'phrin las lnga las dang po pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni zhus pa/ sems can dang sems can du gdags pa dmigs su ma mchis na su'i don du byang chub sems dpa' yum bsgom pa lags/
332b1(mdo 'grel): lan thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i mdza' la 'god pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ni byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar gzung ste/ sems can rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug la 'god cing
332b2(mdo 'grel): drug po de nyid rang bzhin gyis stong zhing mi dmigs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi lam gyi mdzad pa ni dge ba bcu nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la bdag nyid gnas shing sems can gzhan 'god do/ /rang bzhin gyi stong pa nyid kyi mdzad pa la zhus lan gnyis las/ dang po ni
332b3(mdo 'grel): gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la ni sems can dang chos dang chos ma yin pa yang mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don du 'jug lags/ lan de de bzhin te
332b4(mdo 'grel): chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la chos de rnams ma dmigs so/ /gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la gnas te sangs rgyas nas rang bzhin stong pa nyid du mi ston te/
332b5(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo/ /de bas na gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/ /rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhes bya ba'i go ba ni 'jig par mi 'gyur/ phyis med par 'gro ba ma yin/
332b6(mdo 'grel): 'phel 'grib med/ skye 'gag med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang ba med yul na mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas 'gro 'ong med pa de la gnas nas/ bla na med pa'i byang chub la 'jug pa med pa'i tshul gyis 'jug ste/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis
332b7(mdo 'grel): stong par mthong nas/ sgrib pa'i chos thams cad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la byed pa'i skyes bu bcu gnyis nas dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar du mi dmigs na/ bla na med pa'i byang chub la dngos por the tshom lta ga la 'od
333a1(mdo 'grel): dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas 'khor rnam pa bzhi la chos bstan yang rgyun tu zhugs pa la sogs pa thob pa med pa bzhin du phyin ci log gi skyes bu phyin ci ma log pa la 'dod /gang la phyin ci log med pa de
333a2(mdo 'grel): bdag nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du med do/ /gang la gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du med pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid de/ de la gnas shing phyin ci log tu gyur pa sems can gyi 'du shes gzugs kyi 'du shes zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'du shes las
333a3(mdo 'grel): 'grel to/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du don dam pa ni ma yin te/ 'dus ma byas ma skyes pa 'byung ba med pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid do/ /de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste/ bdag
333a4(mdo 'grel): nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yongs su shes pa las lam gyi don du byang chub la 'jug pa med de/ de ni snga phyi bar gsum du rang bzhin gyis mi gtong? ba ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' lam thams cad
333a5(mdo 'grel): yongs su rdzogs par byas/ sems can yongs su smin pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag bar byas nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams
333a6(mdo 'grel): par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhus lan gnyis pa ni byang chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod cing/ gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar yang gzhan la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes 'gal bar mi bgyid/ gzugs nas rnam mkhyen nyid
333a7(mdo 'grel): kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do zhes brjod pa ni ngo mtshar to/ /de'i lan gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar yang gzhan ma yin rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ma yin te/ gal te gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar rang bzhin stong pa ma yin na ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong par khong
333b1(mdo 'grel): du chud nas/ sangs mi rgya par mi thal ba las/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa ni 'jig pa 'am rtag tu gnas pa 'am 'gro sa med de/ gzhan du na 'jig rten rnams ni rmongs shing phung po la mngon par zhen pas skye rga na 'chi'i sdug bsngal las mi grol lo/ /de'i phyir byang chub sems
333b2(mdo 'grel): dpa' rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar stong ngam mi stong zhes rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni 'di gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar ro/ /'di ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar
333b3(mdo 'grel): stong la nyid do zhes rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/ /dper na nam mkha' ni nam mkha' 'khrug par mi byed do/ /de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar yang stong pa nyid 'khrug par mi byed/ /stong pa nyid kyang de rnams 'khrug par mi byed de/ gnyis ka dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//
333b4(mdo 'grel): gnyis zad kyi mdzad pa ni/ gal te chos thams cad ma mchis lags na bdag bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya bar 'gyur/ gnyis su 'byed pa la ni byang chub ma mchis so/ /lan de de bzhin no/ /gnyis la spyod pa la byang chub
333b5(mdo 'grel): med do/ byang chub ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la ni spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni bdag gam bdag gir bya ba med pa ste/ gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la bdag gam bdag gir bya ba med de/ byang chub 'dzin pa dang mi 'dzin pa gang la yang mi
333b6(mdo 'grel): spyod do/ /gsol pa lo na byang chub ci la spyod lags/ lan mog bsgre ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dang/ dgra bcom pa'i rmi lam gyi blo 'dzin pa 'am mi 'dzin pa gang la spyod/ lan dgra bcom pa la nyal ba ma mchis na rmi lam gyi blo 'dzin pa 'am mi 'dzin
333b7(mdo 'grel): pa gang la yang? mi spyod do/ /brda'i mdzad pa ni gsol pa byang chub 'dzin pa dang mi 'dzin pa gang la yang mi spyod/ gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la yang mi spyod na/ spyir lugs kyis ni phar phyin nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rdzogs par byas nas sangs
334a1(mdo 'grel): rgya/ phar phyin nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ma rdzogs na sangs rgya bar mi nus so/ /lan phar phyin nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar ma rdzogs na sangs mi rgya/ rdzogs na sangs rgya zhes pa de bas gzugs nas rnam mkhyen bar de yang rang
334a2(mdo 'grel): bzhin la gnas te sangs rgya'o/ /rang bzhin de yang nye bar zhi ba ste/ 'phel 'grib med skye 'gag med/ kun nas nyon mongs dang rnam par byed ba med thob pa dang mngon par rtogs pa med de/ 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du sangs rgya'i don dam par ni gzugs nas
334a3(mdo 'grel): rnam mkhyen gyi bar du ma yin no/ /de bas na sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub la spyod kyang sems dang sems can dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs so/ /mgo bsgre? ba ni rab 'byor dgra bcom pa thob ces pa de dmigs par
334a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ram/ gsol ba ma lags so /'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis bstan pa lags so/ /don de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni chos gang yang 'phel 'grib bam phan gnod gang yang
334a5(mdo 'grel): ma dmigs te chos kyi rang bzhin nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi rang bzhin de lam dmigs na/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ de ltar byang chub la spyod cing sangs rgyas te sems can gyi don byed do/ /chos nyid
334a6(mdo 'grel): 'khrug pa med pa'i le'u ste re lnga pa'o// //le'u 'di nas mi dmigs pa dang sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i 'phrin las gnyis ston pa las/ dang po la zhus lan bdun ni gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa nas rnam
334a7(mdo 'grel): mkhyen gyi bar rdzogs par bgyis kyang sangs mi rgya lags sam/ lan byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sbyin pa nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la spyod kyang/ de dag kyang mi dmigs de las gzhan du 'ang mi spyod na/ byang chub kyi lam thob
334b1(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur te/ yum de ltar spyod na bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgya'o/ /zhus pa gnyis pa ni byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi lam la brtson bar bgyid pa lags/ de'i lan gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang sbyar bar bya
334b2(mdo 'grel): ba 'am dbye bar bya ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/ /zhus lan gsum pa ni gang sbyar bar bya ba 'am dbye bar bya ba'i ngo bo nyid ma mchis na/ yum la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ yum la ma bslabs na sangs rgya bar mi nus lags so/ /de'i lan de de bzhin te thabs la mkhas pa
334b3(mdo 'grel): yin gyi 'on te ma dmigs na/ 'di ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar re zhes ci zhig gzung/ sbyin pa nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar ni gzung du med pa ste/ slob pa dang byang chub dang sangs rgyas nas so so'i skye bo'i bar ro zhes yod par ga la 'gyur/ zhus pa bzhi ba ni chos
334b4(mdo 'grel): thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa la so so'i skye bo nas sangs rgyas kyi bar du dmigs su ma mchis lags/ lan ji ltar gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la byis pa so so'i skye bos mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba de ltar yod par gyur tam/ yod dam yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol
334b5(mdo 'grel): pa de rnams phyin ci log lags kyi de ni ma mchis lags so/ /lan chos thams cad dngos po med pa la phyin ci log gi dbang gi dngos por bzung ba de byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa de las bzlog nas byang chub la 'jog go /zhu ba lnga ba ni byang chub la 'jug pa'i thabs
334b6(mdo 'grel): la mkhas pa dgang? lags/ lan byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe chos gang la thogs pa'i dngos po 'am zhum pa 'am/ sgyid lug pa 'am/ chi tshad nas le lor gyur pa'i dngos po ma mthong ste/ sems can rnams rmongs pas phung po khams skye mched rten 'brel la
334b7(mdo 'grel): mngon par zhen pas byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par yang dag par rjes su mthong nas/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po lta bu'i lus kyis phar phyin drug gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs las bzlog ste/ rgyun tu zhugs pa la sogs pa la bkod do/ /zhus pa drug pa ni sems can
335a1(mdo 'grel): gtan ma mchis na ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sbyor zhing/ rgyun zhugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du thob par 'gyur lags/ lan kun rdzob kyi brdas de tshe ston pa ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di nyid la bdag kyang mi dmigs na
335a2(mdo 'grel): rgyun zhugs la sogs pa lta ci smos/ zhus pa bdun pa ni chos gcig gam tha dad kyang mi dmigs khams gsum dang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dang/ sems can du gdags pa mi dmigs na sems can bcings grol kun nas nyon mongs dang/ rnam byang las kyi
335a3(mdo 'grel): rgyud tha dad pa las dang nyon mongs rnam par smin pas las bdag gam sems can thams cad rgyun chad par mi 'gyur lags sam/ de'i lan sngon sems can 'gro ba lnga sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa phyis med par 'gyur ba med de/ de bzhin
335a4(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa ni byung rung ma byung rung de bzhin nyid la sogs par gnas te/ de la byed pa'i skyes bu bcu gnyis phung po khams la sogs pa lta ci smos/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba nas dgrol ba lta ga la yod/ byang chub sems dpas sngon gyi sangs rgyas la yang
335a5(mdo 'grel): ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de thos nas/ sems can phyin ci log gi skye bo rnams drang ba'i phyir byang chub la 'jug go /dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po rnams sprul pa zhig gis srog chags mang po sprul te/ bza' ba dang bca' bas tshim par byas nas/ bdag gis bsod nams
335a6(mdo 'grel): mang du spel lo zhes yang yang du brjod na/ des tshim par byas pa 'am bsod nams mang du 'phel ba yod dam/ ma mchis lags so/ /lan byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ sbyin pa nas ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod kyang lam
335a7(mdo 'grel): yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang/ sems can yongs su smin pa dang/ sems can de lta bu btul ba gang yang med do/ /zhus lan gnyis pa lus can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'i phrin las ni rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /sems
335b1(mdo 'grel): can yongs su smin pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa'i byang chub kyi lam gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ sbyin pa nas ma 'dres pa'i bar ni byang chub sems dpa' i lam yin te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa sol sogs pa'i gang zag drug gis sems can
335b2(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bral ba dag mthong na/ khyed ci'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sogs pa la mi spyod /de dag rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /gang zag drug pos smras pa/ phar phyin drug gi rkyen/ zas 'dod pa la zas/ zhes pa nas
335b3(mdo 'grel): mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin gyis/ phar phyin drug la sogs pa la spyod cig ces pa nas yon bdag spen gtor gyi phar phyin drug ste le'u re drug pa'o// //le'u 'di nas mdzad pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' i lam dang/ mngon bar
335b4(mdo 'grel): ma zhen pa dang/ byang chub thob pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' i lam ni sbyin ba nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar ro/ /gsol pa/ gal te chos thams cad stong pa lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa bcu gcig rgyun zhugs la
335b5(mdo 'grel): sogs pa 'di dag ces bslabs na/ spros par mi 'gyur lags sam/ lan byis ba so so'i skye bo yis chos 'di dag stong bar mi shes pas/ mngon par ma zhen pa'i mdzad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba ma gtogs
335b6(mdo 'grel): par gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar mi dmigs te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa'i phyir/ sems can rnams la sbyin pa nas rnam mkhyen la spyod cing des rlom sems su ma byed cig/ /de la snying po gang yang med do zhes nas phar phyin drug la mi gnas/ bsam gtan bzhi nas mngon shes
335b7(mdo 'grel): drug gi bar dang/ de mnyam par bzhag pa dang/ rnam pa gang gis mnyam par bzhag pa la mi gnas/ nyan rang gi byang chub thob kyang mi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung nas sa bcu'i bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin pa sems
336a1(mdo 'grel): gzhan gang yang ma bskyed do/ /byang chub thob pa'i mdzad pa ni/ /gsol pa chos thams cad ma skyes lags na byang chub ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de'i lan chos thams cad ma skyes pa yin yang de lta bu mi shes pa'i don du/ byang chub kyi lam
336a2(mdo 'grel): gyi sems can rnams 'khor ba las thar bar byed do/ /skyes pa dang ma skyes pa dang/ gnyis ka dang gnyis ka ma yin pa la gnas nas byang chub thob par byed pa med pa ma yin gyi/ 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis byang chub thob par bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
336a3(mdo 'grel): yongs su dag par byed pa'i mdzad pa ni gsol pa chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pa lags na/ byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi/ de'i lan byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nas lus ngag gi gnas ngan len sbyangs
336a4(mdo 'grel): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag par byed do/ /de la gnas ngan len ni mi dge ba bcu dang phar phyin drug gi mi mthun phyogs dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs ba dang bral ba dang/ nyan rang gi byang chub la 'dod pa bskyed cing mngon du byed pa dang/ gzugs nas rga
336a5(mdo 'grel): shi'i bar gyi 'du shes dang/ khams gsum dang dmigs pa bcu gcig gi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len no/ /gnas ngan len sbyong ba gsum ni/ bdag phar phyin drug la spyod cing gzhan yang skul ba dang/ zhing sbyong gnyis pa ni mchod pa rnam pa lngas spyod pa dang/
336a6(mdo 'grel): gsum pa ni snyoms 'jug gsum/ byang chub phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun rnam thar sgo gsum la sems can thams cad dgod pa/ nam chos de dag thams cad dang ldan par ma gyur gyi bar du sangs mi rgya bar bdag dang gzhan rnams kyi tshogs sogs cing sangs
336a7(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi zhing dag par byed de de ci nas kyang ngan song gsum dug gsum mi rtag pa la sogs pa bzhi/ bag la nyal dang kun nas ldang ba phyin ci log tu gdags ba'i ming yang mi srid cing/ shing rlung gis btab pa 'am phyi nang gi dngos po dag la rnam thar gsum dang/
336b1(mdo 'grel): skye 'gag med pa dang/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i sgra chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis stong ngo/ /gang stong pa de la mtshan ma med do/ /gang mtshan ma med pa de la smon pa med do/ /zhes bya ba'i sgra nyin mtshan du rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ngo/ /de sangs rgyas dang
336b2(mdo 'grel): sems can rnams la legs pa brjod cing mtshan thos pa de dag thams cad byang chub tu nges te/ /chos yin min gyi the tshom mi za'o/ /sems mi dge ba'i rtsa bas non pa/ dge ba'i bshes kyis mi zin pa rtag chad kyi lta bar ltung nas log par 'dzin te/ sangs rgyas
336b3(mdo 'grel): dang chos yin pa la min/ min pa la yin zhes zer zhing dkon mchog spangs pas/ shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song du 'gro ba de dag thugs rje chen pos bkrol nas byang chub la nges par sbyor ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag pa'i le'u ste re bdun pa'o// //
336b4(mdo 'grel): le'u 'di nas mdzad pa bzhi ste/ nges pa dang/ sems can don dang/ sangs rgyas bsten la sogs pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag go /de las dang po nges pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed pa la sogs pa bla na med pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'o/ /gsol pa
336b5(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' nges pa ngan song gsum la sogs par 'gyur ram/ de'i lan mgo bsgre ba ni/ nyan rang gi byang chub ngan song du mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' phar phyin drug la spyod pa ni mi khom pa'i gnas brgyad la sogs par ltung ba'i
336b6(mdo 'grel): gnas med do/ /sems can don tshad med kyi mdzad pa la ni drug las/ dang po gsol pa/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas khom pa'i gnas brgyad du mi skye na/ sangs rgyas nyid kyang byol song du skye ba'i rabs bstan na de'i tshe dge ba gang du thal/ de'i lan byang chub sems
336b7(mdo 'grel): dpa' mi dge ba'i las kyis ngan song du skyes pa ma yin gyi/ ched du bsams shing sems can don du lus blangs kyang sdug bsngal mi gos so/ /zhus lan gnyis pa dge ba'i chos gang la gnas shing de lta bu'i ngan 'gro'i lus yongs su 'dzin pa lags so/ de'i lan
337a1(mdo 'grel): dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas de lta bu'i lus 'dzin te/ /zhus lan gsum pa dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ji ltar ngan song du 'gyur lags/ de'i lan mgo sgre ba ni de bzhin gshegs
337a2(mdo 'grel): pa dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa sems can gyi don du ngan song du skyes nas sems can gyi don byed kyang ngan song gi sdug bsngal gyis gos pa med pa de bzhin du/ sprul pa bzhin du byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don byed kyang rnam par
337a3(mdo 'grel): rtog pa med la/ sgyu ma'i rta glang bzhin du gsod pa la sogs pa byung yang sdug bsngal med do/ /zhus lan bzhi pa de lta bu'i lus len kyang sdug bsngal gyis mi gos pa'i thabs la mkhas pa de gang lags/ de'i lan yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
337a4(mdo 'grel): la spyod cing gos pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad stong pas gang gis reg pa dang/ gang la reg pa de thams cad dmigs su med do/ /zhus lan lnga pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig la spyod kyi chos gzhan la mi spyod dam/ de'i lan phar
337a5(mdo 'grel): phyin gyis khongs su ma chud pa'i chos gang yang med do zhus lan drug pa sher phyin ngo bo nyid kyis stong na/ ji ltar khongs su 'du lags/ de la ni khongs su chud pa dang ma chud pa ma mchis so/ /de'i lan chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid yin pa la yin par rtogs pas khongs su chud
337a6(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ sangs rgyas bsten sogs kyi 'phrin las ni chos thams cad stong pa la mngon shes drug gis phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur zhing/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ de'i lan phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi
337a7(mdo 'grel): khams kyi sangs rgyas la sogs pa btags pa thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pas/ nyi tshe ba'i stong par mi 'gyur bar mngon shes drug gis sems can gyi don byed pa na/ lha'i spyan gyis chos thams cad stong par mthong zhing gnas nas mngon par bsgrub bo//
337b1(mdo 'grel): lha'i mig rnam par dag ba de nyid kyis phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ste de dag du rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing/ sbyin pa nas ma 'dres pa'i chos kyi bar dang/ theg pa gsum gyis sems can gyi don byed cing sems can phar phyin drug gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs
337b2(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa ston to/ /de lha'i mig gis phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can gang dag skyes pa mthong nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing sems can de dag gi sems khong du chud par byas nas mthun par phar phyin drug dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang/
337b3(mdo 'grel): nges par 'byung ba'i bar gyi chos ston to/ /des lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis lha'i sgra thos te/ nges phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag gi chos mnyan te thos nas de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to/ /bzung nas sems can rnams la
337b4(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa drug nas nges 'byung gi bar gyi chos ston to/ /de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa des/ sems can rnams kyi sems shes nas sbyin pa nas nges 'byung gi bar gyi chos ston to/ /sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa des sngon gyi sangs rgyas dang/ nyan
337b5(mdo 'grel): thos dang sems can gyi gnas rjes su dran pa de dag la sbyin pa nas nges 'byung gi bar gyi chos ston no/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byed/ sems can rnams la sbyin pa nas nges 'byung gi bar du chos ston to/ /zag pa zad pa'i
337b6(mdo 'grel): mngon shes nges sems can rnams la sbyin pa nas nges 'byung gi bar gyi chos ston kyang/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi gos pa'i dpe ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas dgos pa thams cad byed kyang/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi gos pa bzhin no//
337b7(mdo 'grel): byang chub yan lag gi mdzad pa ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing de yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis steng pa'i phyir/ sbyin bdag dang/ btang ba dang/ len par mi rtog cing/ sbyin
338a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi lam mo/ /sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i le'u ste re brgyad pa'o// //le'u 'di nas
338a2(mdo 'grel): mdzad pa gnyis las/ las rnams chud mi za ba ni gsol ba chos de rnams byang chub sems dpa' i chos lags na sangs rgyas kyi chos gang lags/ de'i lan sbyin pa nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar thob par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' i chos yin la/ thob
338a3(mdo 'grel): pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ /gsol pa chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ba la /dmyal ba nas sangs rgyas kyi dbye ba med pa dang/ las dang las kyi rnam smin med par 'gyur ro/ /de'i lan dngos po la las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa'i bya ba
338a4(mdo 'grel): med kyang/ sems can rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par ma shes pas/ ngan par spyad pas ngan song /legs par spyad pas mtho ris su skye'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du spyad nas sems can rnams kyi don byed do/ /gsol pa
338a5(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas nas 'gro ba rgyud ldan nas dge sdig yod par gzigs sam/ ma gzigs/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs na dngos por 'gro /ma gzigs na las dang las kyi rnam smin ji lta bur lung bstan lags kyi lan/ sems can rnams rang gi mtshan nyid
338a6(mdo 'grel): kyis stong par ma shes pas bden par bzung ba la de mi bden par bstan nas/ gzugs nas rga shi'i bar dang/ dmigs pa bcu gcig mi bden bar bstan no/ /bden pa'i mdzad pa zhus lan gsum las/ dang po chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa lags na/
338a7(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams ji ltar grol bar mdzad/ de'i lan chos thams cad bden bzhir bstan nas 'grol lo/ /zhus lan gnyis pa bden pa bzhis grol lam/ bden pa bzhi shes pas grol lags/ de'i lan bden pa dang bden pa shes pa las grol ba ma
338b1(mdo 'grel): yin gyi/ bden pa bzhi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /zhus lan gsum pa mnyam pa nyid de gang lags kyi lan/ chos nyid bdun rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i le'u ste re dgu pa'o// //
338b2(mdo 'grel): le'u 'di nas phyin ci log spangs pa dang/ de'i gzhi med pa'i 'phrin las gnyis las/ dang po ni chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis/ sangs rgyas dang sems can gang gis kyang ma bgyis na las 'dis ni dmyal ba dang lha'i bar du skyes so/ /las 'di 'phags pa'i
338b3(mdo 'grel): gang zag rnams su ji ltar 'gyur/ dngos po ma mchis pa rnams la ni las dang bya ba dang byed pa dang 'bras bu ma mchis lags so/ /de'i lan dngos po mchis pa de rnams med kyang byis pa so so'i skye bos ma shes pas phyin ci log las byung ba'i las sna sogs byed pas
338b4(mdo 'grel): dmyal ba nas sangs rgyas kyi bar du lus sna tshogs 'grub bo/ /khyod dngos po med na las dang 'bras bu dang/ dmyal ba nas sangs rgyas kyi bar mi 'thad do zer ba ni/ khyod de tsho dngos po med pa ma yin snyam mam/ gsol pa de lta ma lags so/ /dmyal ba la sogs pa phyin
338b5(mdo 'grel): ci log gi dbang gis bstan gyi de la dngos po med pa'o/ /phyin ci log gi gzhi med pa'i 'phrin las ni chos thams cad dngos po med na kun nas nyon mongs dang rnam byang mi 'thad do/ /de'i lan skyes bu mkhas pa la ngas dpes bshad kyis/ 'khrul pa'i dpe drug ni rmi lam dang
338b6(mdo 'grel): brag ca dang mig yor dang/ smig rgyu dang/ sprul pa rnams las gang byas pas mtho ris dang ngan song du skye zhing rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba med pa de bzhin du/ 'khor 'das kyi dngos po thams cad gzhi ma grub pa'o/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam byang med
338b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i le'u ste bdun cu pa'o// //le'u 'di nas rnam par byed pa dang/ tshogs dang/ 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas dbyer med par bstan pa'i mdzad pa gsum las/ dang po yang dag mthong ba dang ma mthong ba la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam byang
339a1(mdo 'grel): ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam byang gsungs pa gang lags/ de'i lan chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid chos nyid brgyad ni rnam par byang ba'o/ /tshogs kyi mdzad pa ni chos thams cad 'khrul pa'i dpe dang 'dra bar dngos po dang rdzas
339a2(mdo 'grel): su ma mchis lags na/ spyin pa nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la gnas nas byang chub tu sems bskyed/ de'i lan khyod kyis brjod pa'i chos de rnams 'khrul pa'i dpe drug lta bu ma yin snyam mam/ yang gsol pa chos de rnams 'khrul pa'i dpe drug lta bu lags na/
339a3(mdo 'grel): de rnams ni yang dag pa ma lags/ yang dag pa ma yin pa ni sbyin pa nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la spyad kyang sangs rgya bar mi nus lags sam/ de'i lan sbyin pa nas rnam mkhyen bar gyis sangs mi rgya'o/ /khyod de rnams kyis sangs rgya snyam mam/ sbyin pa nas rnam mkhyen
339a4(mdo 'grel): gyi bar gyi 'dus byas pas ni sangs rgya bar mi nus te/ 'on kyang lam skyed par byed kyi 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir ni ma yin no de rnams kyi skye ba med pa dang 'byung ba med pa dang mtshan nyid med pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /'on kyang sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar
339a5(mdo 'grel): bzung nas dge ba'i chos sbyin pa nas ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du sgyu ma lta bur shes nas lam rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ phar phyin nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar dang/ de ltar spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khrul pa'i dpe drug dang 'dra bas/ sbyin pa nas rnam
339a6(mdo 'grel): mkhyen gyi bar gzung du med pas gzung du med pa'i chos rtogs par mi byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod ba'i tshe/ sems can gyi don du phar phyin drug la spyod cing/ byed ba'i skyes bu med pa la yod par 'du shes pa'i sems can 'grol ba ni thabs yin no zhes so/ /
339a7(mdo 'grel): gsol ba kun rdzob bam don dam par sangs rgya lags/ lan 'jig rten gyi tha snyad la sangs rgyas shes bstan gyi/ yang dag par na 'dis 'di lta bu zhig sangs rgyas shes pa ni dmigs pa ste thob pa med cing mngon par rtog pa med pa/ spros pa med cing spros pa
339b1(mdo 'grel): thams cad dang bral ba mnyam pa nyid ni sangs rgyas so/ /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dbyer med pa'i 'phrin las kyi mdzad ba lnga las/ dang po de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi yum la dbang sgyur ba ma lags sam/ lan ni chos thams cad kyang gzhan
339b2(mdo 'grel): la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin te/ so so'i skye bo nas sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid la khyad med pa'i phyir ro/ /zhus lan gnyis pa/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam ba nyid la khyad ma mchis na/ ji ltar dkon mchog gsum 'jig rten du 'byung bar
339b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur lags/ lan dkon mchog kyang gzhan chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin te/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo la chos rnams rnam par dgod par mdzad pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o//
339b4(mdo 'grel): zhus lan gsum pa de bzhin gshegs pa chos mnyam pa nyid kyang mi g.yo ba de bzhin du/ so so'i skye bo la sogs pa thams cad kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/ lan de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid brgyad gang yin pa de nyid so
339b5(mdo 'grel): so'i skye bo la sogs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid do/ /zhus lan bzhi ba so so'i skye bo nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar gyi chos nyid mnyam pa nyid lags nas 'di ltar mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba/ gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gcig la gcig 'dus pa/ gzugs
339b6(mdo 'grel): nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyi chos nyid gzhan dang gzhan la bslabs nas/ phar phyin drug rdzogs nas sems can smin par bgyid pa lags zer ba'i lan ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyi chos nyid stong pa nyid ma yin snyam mam/ gsol pa de lta ma lags so/ /stong
339b7(mdo 'grel): pa nyid la gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyi mtshan nyid de yod snyam mam/ ma lags de lta bas na chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la so so'i skye bo nas 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams med/ so so'i skye bo nas 'phags pa'i gang zag las gud na'ang
340a1(mdo 'grel): de med bar rig par bya'o/ /zhus lan lnga pa chos nyid de 'dus byas lags sam/ 'dus ma byas lags/ lan ni gnyis ka ma yin te 'dus byas las gud na yang 'dus ma byas med/ don dam pa la lus ngag dang yid med/ de
340a2(mdo 'grel): gsum las gud na'ang don dam pa med de/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa las kyang mi g.yo la byang chub sems dpa' i spyad pa spyod do/ /don dam pa'i rnal 'byor gyi le'u ste
340a3(mdo 'grel): don gcig pa'o// //mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdzad pa la zhus lan drug las/ dang po gsol pa chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa stong pa ste/ byed pa dang bya ba ma mchis kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa don dam
340a4(mdo 'grel): pa las mi g.yo la/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can gyi don bgyid lags/ lan ni don dam ba ci yang med kyang sems can rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ma shes pa byed pa'i skyes bu bcu gnyis su 'du shes pa dang/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang
340a5(mdo 'grel): rten 'brel dang/ 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba la 'god do/ /zhus lan gnyis pa/ gsol pa ci stong pa lags/ lan dus shes thams cad kyis stong ste/ sprul pa zhig sprul na de la stong pa
340a6(mdo 'grel): nyid ma yin pa'i dngos po gang yang med bas/ 'di ni sprul pa'o/ /'di ni stong pa'o zhes dmigs su med do/ /zhus lan gsum pa phung po lnga yang sprul pa'o/ /zhus lan bzhi pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi nas sangs rgyas
340a7(mdo 'grel): kyi bar yang sprul pa lags sam/ lan ni nyan thos rang rgyal/ byang chub sems dpa' / de bzhin gshegs pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa'ang sprul pa'o/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa spang pa thams cad kyang sprul pa'o/ /zhus lan lnga pa sprul pa dang ma sprul pa
340b1(mdo 'grel): de gang lags/ de'i lan skye ba dang 'gag pa'i chos thams cad sprul pa/ ma skyes ma 'gags pa mi mnyam pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ni ma sprul pa'o/ /zhus lan drug pa nyan thos la sogs pa gang gis kyang ma mdzad pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags
340b2(mdo 'grel): de'i lan dngos po yod par gyur la/ phyis dngos po med par 'gyur ba 'am/ rang gi dngos po 'am/ gzhan gyi dngos po yang med na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos nyid cig yod par 'gyur re skon no// //chos nyid mi 'gyur ba bstan pa'i le'u ste
340b3(mdo 'grel): bdun cu don gnyis pa'o// //stong phrag brgya ba'i rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //'di ni kha che'i paN+Di ta d+harma sh+rIs mdzad do zhes grag go/ //
340b4(mdo 'grel): */ (/sher phyin mdzod kyi lde mig kha che d+harma sh+rIs mdzad pa bzhugs/) /rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA ko Sha la nA ma/ bod skad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdzod kyi lde mig ces bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//
340b5(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal nas/ bla ma'i zhal gyi gdams pa ni/ /bdag nyid dran nyams 'jigs spangs phyir/ /lung bzhin du ni dgod bar bya/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la don bzhi ste/ spyir rnam par bzhag pa dgos pa dang bcas pa bstan pa
340b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ brjod par bya ba'i don shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang/ mtshon par byed pa'i dpe brgya rtsa brgyad bstan pa dang/ rjod byed tshigs su bcad pa sum brgya phul gdab po/ /de las dang po yon tan ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/ sangs
340b7(mdo 'grel): rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa/ chos thams cad kyi mchog /'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi gshegs bshul/ bde skyid thams cad 'byung ba'i mdzod/ dug thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i sman/ bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa thams cad
341a1(mdo 'grel): zlog par byed pa'i dka' zlog chen po/ ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pa'i shes rab kyi nyi ma/ yon tan brjod kyis mi lang ba 'di la chos sku spros pa thams cad dang bral ba cir yang ma grub kyang/ gzugs sku snang
341a2(mdo 'grel): pa dag pa la cir yang shar bas mngon par rtogs pa'i snang ba'o/ /mngon rtogs la brgyad las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpe'i sgo nas bstan/ lam shes khrus mkhan dri ma dag par byed pa'i dpe'i sgo nas bstan/ gzhi shes
341a3(mdo 'grel): zhing pa so nam byed pa'i dpe'i sgo nas bstan/ rnam kun mngon rdzogs ded dpon nor bu rin po che 'don pa'i dpe'i sgo nas bstan/ rtse mo mngon rtogs sman pa mkhas pa nad pa gso ba'i dpe'i sgo nas bstan/ mthar gyis pa ma 'dzangs ma bu chung gso ba'i dpe'i
341a4(mdo 'grel): sgo nas bstan/ skad cig ma'i mngon par rtogs pa zo chun rgyud mo'i dpe'i sgo nas bstan/ chos sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa ni nam mkha' i char sprin gyi dpe'i sgo nas bstan no/ /don dam par spros pa thams cad dang bral ba ni mtshon du med par nam mkha' i
341a5(mdo 'grel): dpes bstan/ kun rdzob kyi snang ba 'khrul pa'i dpe brgyad kyis bstan/ grangs la nges pa med pa/ skyes bu'i tshe tshad kyis dpes bstan/ go rim la nges pa med pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpes bstan/ ngo bo nges pa med pa sprul pa'i mi
341a6(mdo 'grel): lus kyi dpes bstan/ chos thams cad tshul gcig tu ston pa shing rnams kyi grib ma'i dpes bstan/ zlos pa yod kyang skyon med pa thag pa thags 'thags pa'i dpes bstan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyi'i rnam par bzhag pa dgos pa
341a7(mdo 'grel): dang bcas pa 'byed pa'i lde mig go/ //brjod par bya ba'i don shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skabs brgyad las/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa chos bcu'i bdag nyid ni byang chub kyi sems lta spyod gnyis kyis nyams su len pa'o/ /de la
341b1(mdo 'grel): sems bskyed ni byang chub kyi ye shes kyi bsam pa/ ched ni byang chub kyi sems kyi 'jug pa/ nges par 'byung ba ni byang chub kyi sems mthar thug pa ste bsam pa bzhin mthar phyin pa'o/ /lta ba ni chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa'o/ /de bstan pa'i cha nas
341b2(mdo 'grel): ni gdams ngag go/ rang bzhin med pa de blos rtogs pa'i cha nas nges 'byed/ byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpar yang mi dmigs par rtogs pa rigs can gyi rten gang zag byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi dge mi dge la sogs pa dmigs pa
341b3(mdo 'grel): bcu gcig /de byang chub sems dpas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas mi dmigs bar rtogs pas dmigs pa'o/ /spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go bgos pa ni go cha/ sbyin pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi lam du 'gro ba ni 'jug pa/ drug
341b4(mdo 'grel): po de tshogs su 'gro ba ni tshogs te/ bcu gsum du bsdus te byang chub kyi sems su bsdus pa'o/ /lam shes la chos bzhi ste/ mnyam gzhag /rjes thob/ phan yon /rten gyi gang zag go /mnyam gzhag ni chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa des gang la yang
341b5(mdo 'grel): mi gnas pa/ gang la yang mi slob pa/ gang yang btsal na mi rnyed pa/ gang yang mi sgrub pa/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o/ /rjes thob ni rang yang yum la mos pa byed/ gzhan yang byed du 'jug /byed pa la rjes su yi rang/ byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
341b6(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba'o/ /phan yon ni mtshan nyid yongs su shes pa'i phan yon dang/ rgyud la nyams su blangs pa'i phan yon dang gnyis so/ /rten gyi gang zag ni lam rnam par dag pa skye ba dang/ mi skye ba'o/ /de yang lam shes kyi chos bcu gcig rten
341b7(mdo 'grel): gyi gang zag gcig gis mnyam bzhag rjes thob gnyis kyis nyams su blangs pas phan yon 'byung ba'o/ /gzhi shes la gnyis te/ 'khrul pa'i gzhi 'khor 'das gnyis/ 'khor ba spangs nas mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa'i thabs shes rab kyi pha rol
342a1(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa'i lta sgom spyod pa rgyud la rten pas spang bya nyon mongs pa la sogs pa 'gags pa 'khor ba spong bar 'dod pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' i gzhi shes 'khor ba rang bzhin med par shes pas mdza' gnyis
342a2(mdo 'grel): gang la yang mi gnas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan mar mi 'dzin/ lta ba spyod pa 'bras bu gsum mtshan mar mi 'dzin/ chos thams cad rang bzhin med pas gzugs dang gzugs kyi rgyud gang la yang mi sbyor/ rnam pa gang gis
342a3(mdo 'grel): kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa'o/ /gzhi shes kyi chos dgu 'khor ba rang bzhin med par shes pas bdag nyid der mi zhen par sems can la 'chi 'pho la sogs pa bstan pa'o/ /rnam kun mngon rdzogs ni zab pa dang rgya che ba gnyis so/ /zab pa ni phung po
342a4(mdo 'grel): dang khams la sogs pa gang la yang mi brtson/ ba sbyor pas chos sku srid pa dang zhi ba mnyam pa nyid do/ /rnam pa rgya che ba ni sbyor ba phan yon gyi rnam pa dang/ skyon gyi rnam pa dang/ sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa dang/ sbyor ba nyams su len par byed
342a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i thabs tha dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po lngas thar pa'i cha mthun gyi rnam pa dang/ sdig pa spong zhing dge ba sgrub pa nges par 'byed pa'i rnam pa dang/ sbyor ba mthar phyin ma phyin rtags kyi rnam pa dang/ sbyor ba'i phan yon zhing dag pa
342a6(mdo 'grel): dang thabs la mkhas pa'i rnam pa'o/ /rnam kun mngon rdzogs kyi chos bcu gcig phung po la sogs pa gang la yang mi gnas pa rgyud la sbyar bas zab pa dang rgya che ba'i rnam par 'char pa'o/ /rtse mo mngon par rtogs pa ni rnam kun mngon rdzogs kyi
342a7(mdo 'grel): sbyor ba las bogs phyung ba las rtags bcu gnyis/ dge ba'i rnam pa bcu drug 'phel/ theg pa chen por nges/ sems kun tu gnas pa ni sbyor lam gyi rtse mo'o/ /mthong lam bsgom lam bar chad med pa gsum ni mnyam gzhag la rnam par mi rtog pa dang/  
342b1(mdo 'grel): de'i phan yon no/ /mnyam par bzhag pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug /shes rab kyis zin nas rtogs pa la bskyed 'byung ba'o/ /mthar gyis pa ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pas pha rol tu phyin pa rim gyis 'char ba'o/ /skad cig ma ni chos thams cad rang bzhin
342b2(mdo 'grel): med pas pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa gcig car du rdzogs pa'o/ /skabs tha ma ni chos thams cad rang bzhin med par mthar phyin pa'o/ /de rnams kyi don yang bsdu na kun rdzob dang/ don dam pa gnyis las/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang/ mnyam par ma bzhag dang/ brgya che ba dang/ thabs
342b3(mdo 'grel): kyi cha thams cad ni kun rdzob bo/ /chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa dang/ mnyam par bzhag pa dang/ zab pa dang/ skye med la sogs pa dang/ rnam par mi rtog pa ni don dam pa'o/ /bden pa gnyis kyang bltos nas bzhag pa las ngo bos grub pa ni med/ skye ba dang/ 'gag pa dang/
342b4(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid dang/ mtshan bzhi dang/ spyi dang/ bye brag dang/ gzung ba dang/ 'dzin pa la sogs pa gnyis dang/ gsum la sogs chos thams cad don la dbyar med yin gyis du ma ro gcig shes par gyis/ brjod par bya ba'i don gtan la 'bebs pa'i lde mig ste
342b5(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa'o// //mtshon par byed pa'i dpe brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstan pa las/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dpe lnga las dang po ni/ chu klung ji snyed yod pa thams cad klu'i bdag po ma dros pa'i mthu yin pa'i dpes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sangs rgyas
342b6(mdo 'grel): nyag gcing gi spyod yul yin yang/ nyan thos dang rang rgyal so so'i skye bo rnams la snang bas byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa ma chad par bstan/ sgyu ma gzhan dang phung po gzhan du mi byed pa'i dpes byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa bden brdzun
342b7(mdo 'grel): dbyer med par bstan/ rdza so ma btang bar chus reg pa'i dpes thabs mi mkhas pa'i gang zag sdig pa'i grogs pos zin na brlag par bstan/ sgyu ma mkhan gyis gzhi mdor sprul nas dmyal ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i dpes byang chub sems dpa' shes rab
343a1(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'jigs pa dang zhen pa mi skye bar bstan/ me shi de'i 'gro rgyu med pa'i dpes bud shing las me logs su ma grub pas 'khor ba rang bzhin med par shes pa las mya ngan las 'das pa 'gro rgyu med
343a2(mdo 'grel): par bstan no/ /lam shes la dpe bcu dgu las/ dang po 'dren pa 'dus ma byas la mi gnas zhes pas sangs rgyas gang la yang mi gnas pa'i dpes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la yang mi gnas par bstan/ tshu rol pha rol 'gro dogs mi
343a3(mdo 'grel): mthong zhes pas mdza' ma mthong ba'i bya'i dpes yum la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rtag chad kyi mdza' mi mthong bar bstan/ chos 'chad pa dang nyan pa nas bzung nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar sgyu ma lta bur bstan pa'i dpes nyan pa la  
343a4(mdo 'grel): sogs pa nas 'khrul snang du shes na de nyid bsgom pa yin par bstan/ nam mkha' i khams dang mtshungs te dbyer med tha dang med pa'i dpes gzugs la sogs pa'i chos dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med pas gcig dang tha dad
343a5(mdo 'grel): du ma grub pas btsal na mi rnyed par bstan to/ /mos pa'i dpe bdun ni/ rig sngags chen mo'i dpes mya ngan sdug bsngal gyi chos zhi pa dang/ sman pa'i rgyal po'i dpes nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad zhi ba dang/ sa bon btab nas sa la myu
343a6(mdo 'grel): gu 'byung ba'i dpes shes rab kyis dge ba'i lo tog thams cad 'phel ba dang/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang na yod sa na rin po che sna bdun la sogs pa'i dpes yum spyod sa na lta spyod rin po che thams cad 'byung bar bstan/ rgyal
343a7(mdo 'grel): po brten mi rim gro thob pa'i dpes yum rgyal po dang 'dra/ sku gdung rgyal po la brten pa'i mi dang 'dra bar bstan/ rin po che ga'u tog gi nang du bcug nas gton pa'i dpes yum rin po che dang 'dra/ sku gdung rin po che'i snod rnying pa dang mtshungs
343b1(mdo 'grel): par bstan/ shing rnams lo ma dang me tog tha dad kyi grib ma la dbyer med pa'i dpes sde snod kyi chos thams cad tshul gcig par bstan no/ /mos pa byed du 'jug pa'i dpe gsum ni/ myu gu med na sdong bu med pa'i dpes byang chub kyi sems med na mngon
343b2(mdo 'grel): mtho dang des legs kyi bde ba mi 'byung bar bstan/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyi dra ba 'gyed pa'i sems can las byed pa rnams brtson pa'i dpes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yum yong na sdig pa spong zhing dge bsgrub par bstan/ ma dros
343b3(mdo 'grel): gnas pa'i klu'i bdag po med na chu klung dang rtsi shing nags tshal la sogs pa mi 'byung ba'i dpes/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes med pas nges par legs pa byang chub rnam pa gsum dang/ mngon par mtho
343b4(mdo 'grel): ba'i chos mi 'byung bar bstan no/ /snang byed thams cad pas nyi ma'i 'od zer mchog tu bzhag pa'i dpes nyan thos la sogs pa'i bsod nams byas pa'i dngos po bas byang chub sems dpa' i rjes su yi rang bsod nams khyad par 'phags par bstan/
343b5(mdo 'grel): dug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas kyi dpes mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i dge pa'i rtsa ba mthar sdug bsngal du gyur par bstan/ dmus long dmigs bu med pa'i dpes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi spyan dang 'dra bar bstan/ zong zad slar
343b6(mdo 'grel): log na mi rung ba'i dpes ngal 'byor gyi zong zang nas ngan 'gror 'gro bar bstan/ nam mkha' i khams dang mtshungs te dbyer med gcad du med pa'i dpes gzugs la sogs pa'i 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad rang bzhin med pas dag par bstan to/
343b7(mdo 'grel): gzhi shes kyi dpe drug las/ 'khor ba'i dpe gsum ni 'dam la zin pa'i dpes ming dang gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po la chags pa bstan/ rlung gi 'khor lo'i dpes khams gsum du 'khyams shing rgyud drug tu 'khor ba bstan/ ri dags rgyad  
344a1(mdo 'grel): chud kyi dpes sems can skye rga na 'chi'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar bstan/ nam mkha' la bya 'phur ba'i dpes rigs kyi bu shes rab dang ldan pa dngos po yod med kyi mdza' las mi 'tshor bar bstan/ nyi ma gza' dang bral
344a2(mdo 'grel): ba lhang nge 'dug pa'i dpes gzugs la sogs pa'i chos dang chos can gyis mi sgrib par bstan/ me btang nas rtsa shing thams cad sreg par byed pa'i dpes spang bya dang gnyen po thams cad las grol nas gang la yang rlom sems mi byed
344a3(mdo 'grel): par bstan no/ /rnam kun mngon rdzogs la dpe sum cu rtsa dgu las sbyor ba'i dpe lnga ni/ chos 'di sprul dang sgyu ma 'dra shes kyi dpes snang ba 'khrul snang du bstan/ dgon pa'i lam ni dpag tshad mang por phyin pa'i dpes 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba la
344a4(mdo 'grel): sogs pa'i byed pa 'di sangs rgyas kyi grong khyer du phyin pa'i rtags su bstan/ rgya mtsho chen po lta ru 'gro ba la rtags ma mthong ba rgya mtsho chen po nye ba'i rtags kyi dpes mi dge ba la sogs pa'i rtags med pa byang chub thob pa'i rtags su bstan dpyid
344a5(mdo 'grel): dus kyi rtsi shing kha 'bus na lo 'bras me tog 'byung ba shes pa'i dpes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa byed na myur du bde legs thams cad 'byung bar bstan/ sbrum ma zla ba tshang ba'i dpes snang ba bkrag chung du song tsam na
344a6(mdo 'grel): myur du sangs rgyas par bstan no/ /bar chad kyi dpe lnga ni/ glog bzhin myur du nyams pa'i dpes bstan ba chung bas phan mi thogs par bstan/ mi shes de dag rtsa ba bor nas rmongs pa yal ga dag dang 'dab ma tshol pa'i dpas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
344a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i don sems kyi don bor nas theg pa chung ngu'i mdo slob pa 'khrul par bstan/ glang po rnyed nas glang po'i rjes tshol gyi dpes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnyed nas sgra dang tshang ma la sogs pa tha snyad slob pa 'khrul par bstan/ zas mchog
344b1(mdo 'grel): rnyed nas zas ngan tshol bar byed pa'i dpes mnyam gzhag la sems brtan nas lus ngag gi dge pa la 'bad pa 'khrul bar bstan/ rin po che la dgra 'byung ba'i dpes zab mo la bar chad 'ong ba mi 'gal bar bstan no/ /mtshan nyid kyi dpe ma zhig na bar
344b2(mdo 'grel): gyur la bu ni mang yod kyi dpes dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad 'di las 'byung bas yum dang sras su sgrub pa bstan/ shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dpe bzhi ni/ dga' ba'i tshal gyis dpes sems can ngan song gi sdug bsngal las 'don kyang
344b3(mdo 'grel): sems can du mi dmigs pa dang/ seng ge ri su la gyi dpes bdag med seng ge'i sgra yis bdag tu lta ba spong zhing byang chub sems dpa' la nyam da ba med par bstan/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis sa skems shing gzugs rnams ston pa'i dpes srid
344b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i chu bo skems shing 'khor gyi chos ston pa'i snang ba 'byung ba dang/ nam mkha' mthong zhes sems can tshig tu rab brjod kyi dpes gang yang mthong ba med pa chos nyid kyi don mthong bar bstan no/ /khyad par gyi mtshan nyid kyi dpe drug ni/ rgyal po grong
344b5(mdo 'grel): du mi 'gro bar rang gi yum nas 'du ba thams cad sdud pa'i dpes/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi sa'i yon tan thams cad 'byung bar bstan/ rgyal po btang snyoms 'dug cing blon po kun byed kyi dpes sangs rgyas kyi
344b6(mdo 'grel): phrin las thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas byed pas bstan/ rgya mtshor gru zhig na mi ro dang rkyal pa la mi 'jug pa dang/ 'jus pa'i dpes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa mi byed na 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las mi thar 'dzin pa la
344b7(mdo 'grel): sogs pa byed na thar par bstan/ bum pa so btang ba dang ma btang pa chus reg pa'i dpes byang chub kyi mchog tu sems ma bskyed pa dang bskyed pa mi grol ba dang grol bar bstan/ gru zag lhan ma byas pa dang byas pa'i dpes dam tshig dang sdom pa la gnas pa dang 
345a1(mdo 'grel): mi gnas pa 'khor ba'i rgya las thar ba dang mi thar ba stan/ mi rgas pa g.yas g.yon gnyis nas mis brten pa dang ma brten pa'i dpes thabs dang shes rab kyis zin pa dang ma zin na bdag gzhan gyi don 'grub mi 'grub pa stan/
345a2(mdo 'grel): nam mkha' i khams ni shar phyogs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dpes chos nyid phyogs dang ris su ma chad par bstan no/ /bya zhig lus tshe dpag tshad la sogs pa'i dpes thabs shes rab 'bring gis rtogs pa dka' bar bstan/ /bsgom lam las phyir mi
345a3(mdo 'grel): ldog pa'i rtags kyi dpe drug ni/ mda' yis rgya mtsho'i gting thug tshol ba'i dpes so sor rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi phung po la sogs pa'i gting mi rtogs par bstan/ 'dod chags chos la spyod pa'i skyes bu'i rnam par rtog pa'i dpes ma yengs
345a4(mdo 'grel): par rang gis gsal btab pa rgyud la goms dgos par bstan/ bsod nams de yang gsog gsob dang snying po med pa'i dpes/ mngon par 'du byas pa'i dge ba la mi zhen par bstan/ 'bru mar snying po 'bar ba'i dpes byang chub kyi
345a5(mdo 'grel): sems rten 'brel yin pas zab par bstan/ sa bon las ni myu gu 'byung de yang 'gags la sogs pas nyon mongs pa 'gags pa med par zab par bstan/ chu'i thigs pa bum pa dang po tha ma'i bar gyis dge ba rim gyis sog par bstan
345a6(mdo 'grel): mnyan pa mkhas pa phar 'gro tshur 'gro byed kyang mi gnas pa'i dpes srid pa dang zhi ba ma grub kyang dmigs pa can las 'bras yod par bstan/ thabs la mkhas pa'i dpe dgu ni/ skyes bu mkhas pa yon tan kun ldan gyi dpes spang bya sgyu ma
345a7(mdo 'grel): la gnyen po sgyu ma bstan/ mkha' la rlung rten gyi dpes chos thams cad gzhi rtsa med par bstan/ nam mkhar gnas pa'i bya sa la mi ltung ba'i dpes thabs dngos por mi 'char bar bstan/ 'phongs bslobs skyes bus gnam du mda''phangs kyi
345b1(mdo 'grel): dpes chogs sog pa stong pa nyid rtogs pa'i thabs su bstan/ dge slong rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i dpes stong pa nyid rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi don la skyo ba med pa'i thabs su bstan/ lag pa gnyis kas gdugs gnyis 'dzin
345b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i dpes thabs shes rab dang ldan pas 'khor ba'i g.yang sar mi ltung bar bstan/ rin po che blan zhing gnyen la mi ster ba rigs pa dang mi ldan pa'i dpes bdag nyid stong pa nyid rtogs nas sems can stong pa nyid la dgod pa'i thabs bstan/ ded dpon
345b3(mdo 'grel): tshong pa rgyu bar shes par bya ba'i phyir grong khyer la sogs par goms par byed pa'i dpes 'dus byas thams cad sems gzhan gyi chos nyid rtogs pa'i thabs su bstan/ sprul pa'i mi lus mi snang ma yin pa'i dpes rnam thar sgo gsum dngos por ma grub
345b4(mdo 'grel): kyang sems can gyi don du 'gro bar bstan to/ /rtse mo'i dpe sum cu rtsa gcig las/ rtags kyi dpe gsum ni mkhas pas nga rgyal nges bcom ste/ nad pa'i tshogs kyi sman pa bsten pa ltar gyi dpes dug gsum zhi bar 'dod pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gus pa'i
345b5(mdo 'grel): sgo nas bsten pa bstan/ byis pa'i bdag nyid kyi ni mkha' la mdud pa bor ba'i dpes 'khor bar 'ching ba ma grub par bstan/ dug de khong du song ba med kyang brgyal bar 'gyur gyi dpes rang bzhin med pa la bdag tu bzung bas skye rga na 'chi'i sdug bsngal myong
345b6(mdo 'grel): bar bstan no/ /rnam par mi rtog pa'i dpe bdun ni/ rin po che rnyed nas bag med pas stong na mya ngan gyi gdung ba 'byung ba'i dpes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dor bar bstan/ nyi ma sprin med kyi 'od zer gyis snang ba gzhan zil gyis gnan cing mun pa 'joms
345b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i dpes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dge ba bcu la sogs pa zil gyis gnon cing ma rig pa'i mun pa 'joms par bstan/ rgyal po'i bu zhig nor gtong don 'dod kyi dpes/ lha dang mi thams cad rigs kyi bu de la mos par stan/ sha za 'dra
346a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i dpes byang chub sems dpa' nang rtsod pa la sogs pa byed na rtsod pa'i dus de nyid na yi dags dang 'dra bar bstan/ nyi ma mkha' la 'gro ba'i 'od zer gyis non na mun pa med pa'i dpes rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi
346a2(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dge ba la mi dge ba mi 'byung bar bstan/ lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis 'jigs tshogs su 'dus pa rjes su 'gro ba'i dpes srog gi dbang po 'gags na dbang po thams cad 'gag pa rtog pa'i dpes dge ba'i chos thams
346a3(mdo 'grel): cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dus par bstan no/ /rnam par mi rtog pa'i dpe bzhi ni/ nam mkha' dang nam mkha' mi 'gal ba'i dpes rang gi ngo bo rnam par mi rtog par bstan/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i dpes bya ba la mi rtog pa bstan/ sangs rgyas
346a4(mdo 'grel): kyi sprul pa sems can gyi don byed kyang rang la dregs pa med pa'i dpes byed po la mi rtog pa bstan/ shing gi 'khrul 'khor gyi dpes 'bras bu la mi rtog pa bstan no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dpe brgyad la bar snang sprin bzhin
346a5(mdo 'grel): gnas pa med pa'i chos nyid la mi gnas pa dang/ rig sngags 'chang mkha' la rgyu ba'i dpes stong nyid kyi don rtogs pa dang/ dus min me tog 'byung ba'i dpes sems nyid dag pa la phan yon 'byung ba dang/ 'dab chags mkha' la
346a6(mdo 'grel): gnas kyang mi ltung ba'i dpes stong nyid rtogs kyang zhi ba phyogs gcig par mi 'gro ba dang/ nya ni chu la gnas kyang 'tshubs nas mi 'chi ba'i dpes/ 'khor ba na gnas kyang skye rga na 'chi'i sdug bsngal gyis mi 'chi ba dang/ sa la zad pa dang
346a7(mdo 'grel): 'phel ba med pa'i dpes shes rab la 'phel 'grib med pa dang/ 'khrul pa'i 'khor lo'i dpes 'khor 'das gnyis ka rten 'brel gyi 'khrul pa yin pa dang/ nyi ma sprin med kyis mun pa sel ba'i dpes rnam rtog ye shes su 'char ba'o/ /
346b1(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan gyi dpe bzhi ni/ dzam bu'i gling gi mis lha yul du phyin nas mi yul du mi chags pa'i dpes rigs kyi yum l spyod pa 'dod pa la mi zhen pa dang/ chu snang pad+ma'i dpes 'khor ba'i nang na gnas kyang de'i skyon gyis ma gos pa dang/
346b2(mdo 'grel): rin po che rnyed nas de la ma zhen pa'i dpes bsam gtan gyi bde ba thob kyang de la yang dag tu mi 'dzin pa dang/ mnyan pa gru zhig gis dpes bsam gtan theg pa sman pa'i don du spyod pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi dpe bzhi ni/ bran mo'i dpes nga rgyal
346b3(mdo 'grel): med na brtson 'grus yin pa dang/ rtsa dang shing la me byung ba'i dpes bde skyed rang gis sreg pa dang/ bu gcig pa la ma ni rim gro byed pa'i dpes sems can gyi don la mi skyo ba dang/ gnam sa cha ral gyi dpes bdag dang lus bden par bzung na
346b4(mdo 'grel): sems can gyi don mi 'grub pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i dpe bzhi ni bdag nyid ya ma brla dang 'dra ba'i dpes bdag nyid la phangs pa med pa dang/ gling gzhi legs par brgyan pa'ang mchil ma'i thal ba dang 'dra ba'i dpes longs spyod la ma chags pa dang/
346b5(mdo 'grel): nor bu mching bu'i phung po chen po yang rin po che gcig gis zil gyis gnon pa'i dpes 'gro ba kun gyi dge ba thams cad byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi rang na zil gyis gnon pa dang/ yon tan rin po che 'byung bas nor bu rin po che dang 'dra pa'o
346b6(mdo 'grel): brtag pa mdza' gzung gi dpe brgyad ni dzam bu'i gling la sogs pa mchod rten gyis bkang ba bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khyad par 'phags pa dang/ dzam bu'i gling sku gdung gis bkang ba bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dam pa dang /
346b7(mdo 'grel): dzam bu'i gling la sogs pa dgra bcom pa la bzhag pa bas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byin na bsod nams che ba dang/ dzam bu'i gling la sogs pa'i sems can gnas pa la sbyin pa btang ba bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsod nams che ba dang /
347a1(mdo 'grel): stong gsum gyi ri rab srang la gzhal bar chad gzung du nus kyi sems kun du gnas pa'i tshad gzung bar mi nus pa dang/ chu chen po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bdud sdig can du gyur nas ba spu nyag re re las de snyed sprul
347a2(mdo 'grel): kyang bar chad bya bar mi nus pa dang/ stong gsum rin po ches bkang nas phul ba bas bzod pa la gnas pa lhag pa dang srid pa gsum ni sems can ji snyed yod pas rin po che sangs rgyas la sogs pa la dmigs pa dang bcas pas phul pa
347a3(mdo 'grel): pa bas dmigs pa med pa'i shes rab kyi khyad par du 'phags pa'o/ /mtshon pa dpe'i lde mig ste gsum pa'o// //rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu rtsa dgu las dang po sngon byung la
347a4(mdo 'grel): tshigs su bcad pa gcig /sems bskyed kyi ngo bo la gcig /dpe la gcig /don la gcig /rgyu mtshan la gcig ste sems bskyed la bzhi'o/ /gdams ngag la gcig /nges 'byed la bcu las drod dang rtse mo la tshigs su bcad pa gsum/ bzod pa la gnyis/
347a5(mdo 'grel): chos mchog la gcig /nges 'byed gyi ting nge 'dzin mjug bsdu ba la gcig ste bdun no/ /gzung rtog la gcig /'dzin rtog la gcig yongs su 'dzin pa la gcig ste bcu'o/ /rten dang dmigs pa gnyis la gcig /ched du bya ba la gcig /go cha
347a6(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi tshogs la gcig /zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi tshogs la gcig /gzung du 'brel ba'i tshogs la gcig /thabs la mkhas pa la sogs pa bdun gyi tshogs la gcig /nges 'byung gi sgrub ba la bdun
347a7(mdo 'grel): las ched du bya ba dang/ mnyam pa nyid dang/ sems can don dang/ lhun gyis grub pa'i nges 'byung bzhi la gcig /shin tu nges par 'byung ba dang/ thob pa'i nges 'byung gnyis la gcig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i nges 'byung la gsum/ lam gyi
347b1(mdo 'grel): nges 'byung la tshigs su bcad pa gnyis lam shes pa la tshigs su bcad pa lnga bcu rtsa bzhi las dang po ji ltar gnas pa la tshigs su bcad pa gsum/ ji ltar bslob pa la lnga/ mthong lam gyi ye shes btsal na ma rnyed pa la gcig /de'i phan yon dang bsgom
347b2(mdo 'grel): lam gyi byed pa la lnga/ mos pa yid la byed pa la bcu bzhi yod pa las rang gi don du mos pa la gsum/ gnyis ka'i don du mos pa la bzhi/ gzhan gyi don du mos ba la bdun no/ /gzhan mos ba byed du 'jug pa la brgyad/ rjes su yi rang ba la
347b3(mdo 'grel): gnyis/ bsngo ba la brgyad las khyad par gyi bsngo ba la bzhi/ mi dmigs pa dang phyin ci ma log pa gnyis la gcig /thabs la mkhas pa dang mtshan ma med par bsngo ba la gcig /sangs rgyas kyi gnang ba'i bsngo ba la gcig /bsod nams che 'byung gi bsngo ba
347b4(mdo 'grel): la gcig go /sgrub pa la bzhi/ rnam dag skye ba'i rgyu la gcig /mi skye ba'i rgyu la gnyis/ rnam dag dngos la gcig go /gzhi shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo la gcig /thabs kyi nye ring dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs bzhi la gcig /sbyor ba la gcig /rnam pa la gcig /nyan
347b5(mdo 'grel): thos la sogs pa'i mthong lam la tshigs su bcad pa gcig ste lnga'o/ /rnam kun mngon rdzogs la tshigs su bcad pa dgu bcu rtsa bdun las/ dang po sbyor ba la bcu ni/ chos nyid kyi sbyor ba lnga la gcig /tshogs chen po yun ring bos thob pa'i sbyor ba dang/
347b6(mdo 'grel): lung bstan pa dang/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang gsum la gcig /nges 'byung la dpe don gnyis/ bar chad med pa la dpe don gnyis/ byang chub nye ba la gcig /myur ba la gcig /'phel 'grib med pa dang/ chos dang chos ma yin pa mi mthong ba
347b7(mdo 'grel): gnyis la gcig /rnam par mi rtog pa dang yon tan bcu bzhi la gcig go /skyon la tshigs su bcad pa bcu las/ skyon spyir dris ba la tshigs su bcad ba gcig /tshogs chen por yun ring por dang/ spobs pa ha cang myur ba dang/ lus kyi gnas ngan len dang/
348a1(mdo 'grel): sems kyi gnas dran len dang/ rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pa'i kha ton la sogs pa lnga la gcig /phyir phyogs pa'i rgyu mtshan la gcig /rgyu la mngon par zhen pa nyams pa dang/ theg pa mchog la nyams pa
348a2(mdo 'grel): pa gnyis la gcig /ro mchog las nyams pa las cig /rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags pas nyams pa la gcig /slob dpon dang slob ma mi mthun pas nyams pa la gcig /skyon gyi rnam pa gzhan bstan pa la gcig /yon tan can
348a3(mdo 'grel): la bar chod 'byung ba la bstan pa la gcig /mos gus can la bar chod kyis mi tshugs pa la gcig ste bcu'o/ /mtshan nyid la tshigs su bcad pa sum cu las mtshan nyid spyir bstan pa la gcig /shes pa'i mtshan nyid la brgyad las gzhi
348a4(mdo 'grel): shes pa la gnyis/ lam shes pa la gcig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la lnga'o/ /khyad par gyi mtshan nyid la bcu bzhi las/ dge ba thams cad sdud pa la gcig /byed pa la gcig /sgrub pa la gcig /dmigs pa la dpe don
348a5(mdo 'grel): gnyis/ rten la dpe don gnyis/ mdza' dag la dpe don gnyis/ yongs su 'dzin pa la dpe don gnyis/ ro myang ba med pa la gsum mo/ /byed pa la gcig /ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid la drug ste sum cu'o/ /thar pa'i cha mthun la gsum/ nges par
348a6(mdo 'grel): 'byed pa la gcig /sbyor lam dang mthong lam gyi rtags la bdun/ bsgom lam las phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags la bcu gnyis/ chos sku la dpe don gnyis/ zhing dag pa la gcig /sems can gyi don du thabs mkhas pa la tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu
348a7(mdo 'grel): rtsa gcig go /rtse mo mngon par rtog pa la tshigs su bcad pa brgya dang dgu ston pa las/ rtags la bco brgyad ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags la gsum/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i rtags la brgyad las/ yon tan gyi gzhi las byung ba la gcig /ming gi
348b1(mdo 'grel): gzhi las byung ba la gnyis/ dben pa'i gzhi las byung pa'i bdud kyi las la lnga/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gnyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis/ 'khor 'das la ma zhen pa la gsum ste bco brgyad do/ /rnam par 'phel ba la nyi shu rtsa gcig
348b2(mdo 'grel): gis ston pa la dzam bu'i gling du dge ba bcu la sogs pa bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthun par byed pa bsod nams che ba la gsum/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la byed pa dang mi 'gal ba la gsum/ dge ba bcu las khyad par du 'phags pa la
348b3(mdo 'grel): gnyis/ lha'i rigs thams cad nye bar 'ong ba la gnyis/ bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon pa la drug /bslab pa rnam par dag pa la gnyis/ mi dge ba la sogs pa'i go mi 'byed pa la gcig /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus pa la gnyis te nyi shu rtsa
348b4(mdo 'grel): gcig go /nges pa la gcig /kun tu gnas pa la gnyis/ rnam par mi rtog pa la drug /mi rtog pa'i phan yon la bzhi ste bcu'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshigs su bcad pa bcu gsum/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bcu/ brtson 'grus kyi pha
348b5(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa la bcu gcig /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bdun/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyed dang dgu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang brgyad do/ /mthar gyis pa la tshigs su bcad pa bzhi las/ sbyin pa la gcig /
348b6(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims dang bzod pa la gcig /brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan la gcig /shes rab la gcig go /skad cig ma la rkang pa gcig go /chos sku la rkang pa gsum/ mdo yon tan rin po che don dang ldan pa'i mtshan bstan pa la gcig go /rjod par byed pa'i
348b7(mdo 'grel): tshig phul gdab pa'i lde mig ste bzhi pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdzod kyi lde mig ces bya ba kha che'i mkhan po bla ma d+harma sh+rIs mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
349a1(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa sdud pa'i gdams ngag 'di/ myang chu sa'i snying po dpal/ 'bum stengs kyi gtsug lag khang gsar du bzhengs pa'i dus su/ slob
349a2(mdo 'grel): dpon chen po byang chub sems dpa' dang gdan 'jom nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bsgyur cing bka' stsal te/ ston sgom sbag ma gsum gyis zhu ba phul/ dge slong dri ma
349a3(mdo 'grel): med pas yon bdag mdzad pa dang/ mkhas pa chen po ba reg lo tsA bas sems can gyi don du bsgyur ba'o// mang+gA la/
